sentences.sContent: Every piece of glass has a natural resonant frequency—the speed at which it will vibrate if bumped or otherwise disturbed by some stimulus, such as a sound wave—as does every other material on Earth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every piece of glass has a natural resonant frequency—the speed at which it will vibrate if bumped or otherwise disturbed by some stimulus, such as a sound wave—as does every other material on Earth.
sentences.sCn: 每片玻璃都有一个自然的共鸣频率——在此速度下，如果受到碰撞或者由某种刺激物打扰，它就会震动，如声波——地球上其他物质也是如此。

synos.tran: 洪亮的，共振的；[语]共鸣的

phrases.pCn: 共振腔；空腔谐振器，呼吸腔
谐振槽；谐振回路；共鸣箱

remMethod.val: re(反) + son(声音) + ant → 回声 → 回响的

words.tran: [声] 共鸣器，共鸣体；共振器
产生共鸣；回响（resonate 的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: resonant materials increase any sound produced inside them
